channel.title: CVE Feed for loopus -- WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for loopus -- WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-32510|2024-06-04T17:51:08.236Z -- loopus -- wp%20cost%20estimation%20%26%20payment%20forms%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Loopus WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder: from n/a through 10.1.75.

item.title: CVE-2024-32509|2024-04-17T07:43:17.984Z -- loopus -- wp%20cost%20estimation%20%26%20payment%20forms%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Loopus WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder.This issue affects WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder: from n/a through 10.1.76.

item.title: CVE-2024-30489|2024-03-31T18:18:31.097Z -- loopus -- wp%20cost%20estimation%20%26%20payment%20forms%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in loopus WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder.This issue affects WP Cost Estimation & Payment Forms Builder: from n/a through 10.1.75.
